modName: Personal Save File Dragonborn and Dawnguard Require
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3142/?]Skyrim Character Editor [/url][s][/s][/color]-[size=4] Make sure to used it. [size=2]The reason[/size][/size][size=2] I did this was because I wanted people to build their own Character.
You start as a female [color=#ffff00]Altmer [/color]Lvl.1, with [color=#ffff00]5074 gold[/color] , [color=#ff7700]Oghma Infinium[/color], make sure to check the Chest for quest Items.
[/size]
[size=3]Main Quest - Complete[b]
[/b][/size][list][*][color=#B45F06][size=3]Paarthurnax Lives[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3]Civil War - Complete[/size]
[list][*][color=#ff0000][size=3]The Empire[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3]College of Winterhold- Complete[/size]
[list][*][color=#00ffff][size=3][b]Arch-Mage[/b][/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3]Dark Brotherhood - Complete[/size]
[list][*][color=#00ff00][size=3]Destroyed[/size][/color][/*]
[/list][size=3][color=#980000][color=#ffff00]The Companions[/color] [/color]- Incomplete
[color=#ff00ff]Dawnguard [/color]- Incomplete
[color=#ff7700]Dragonborn [/color]- Incomplete[/size]
author: Snowelf27
